explanation: [0-0] A man in a gray tracksuit, holding a box of raw meat, stands beside a go-kart track. Behind him, a go-kart racer in a colorful racing suit and yellow helmet sits in a kart.

[0-4] The man takes out the raw meat from the package and shows it. Then he fixes the meat to the exhaust pipe of the go-kart, testing whether the kart can cook the meat. After securing it, the man pushes the kart with his foot, and the kart moves along the track.

[13-19] Soon, the go-kart arrives at the finish line, where the man in gray stands with a white table beside him. A man in black sits by the table. The man in gray raises his hand to signal a stop, and the kart stops in front of the table. He then walks to the back of the kart, smiling, and takes the meat off the exhaust pipe. He brings the slightly browned meat to the man in black, gestures with his hand as if cutting the meat, and signals the man to cut the meat with the knife and fork in his hand. He then places the meat on the white plate in front of the man.
